Watch Frank Gaffney and his Center for Security Policy event live today beginning at 12:00 p.m. EDT

Featuring speakers will incude:

Jim Hanson’s “Cut Down the Black Flag” https://www.centerforsecuritypolicy.org/2015/10/02/cut-down-the-black-flag-book-release/

The Center’s collaborative work “Secure Freedom Strategy” https://www.centerforsecuritypolicy.org/the-secure-freedom-strategy/

New book “Architects of Disaster” by former Michigan Rep. Pete Hoekstra (now with Investigative Project on Terrorism) http://www.amazon.com/Architects-Disaster-Destruction-Libya-Calamo/dp/0692438955

Elliot Chodoff, a political and military analyst specializing in the Middle East conflict and the global war on terrorists.
